name: Pervertica
description:
Overall:

Once upon a time, there’s a magical kingdom named Pervertica

The Kingdom has lived for a thousand years under the power of the Mighty Pervert - an ancient god live beneath this land, the people live happily using the force of Pervert until one day…

The magical force of Mighty Pervert attracted many powerful creatures, they came to steal and use it to reinforce their outfit - the life source of anything. Arietta is a young White Knight of Pervertica, who decided to take a trip to defeat enemies with the promise to reclaim the kingdom’s force.

Feature:

Pervertica is a rhythm-fighting game.
Try your best to stack up the combo and release a perfect strike on the enemy, but remember, you can only attack 5 times, so be wary.

Each time you defeat an enemy, you can collect a card, let’s see if you can collect it all.

Controls:

Left/ Right/ Up / Down Arrow to stack up the combo. 

 Space to do the awesome combo and deal damage to the enemy.

Press the opposite direction with the red arrow.
